job.title: Data Scientist-1
job.description: In this role you will guide and influence technical project direction and solve significant technical problems by leveraging scientificengineering skills and strong foundational Data ampamp Modeling Sciences understanding developed through handson experimentationapplication You will perform applied deep machine learning work and demonstrate implementation skills leveraging knowledge that moves technical projects forward while gaining exposure to and demonstrating proficiency in integration and deep technology deploymentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe are looking for someone with a PhD in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or other deep expertise in Data Science  Artificial Intelligence subdisciplines
